name: Brahim BIDI
aboutMe:
Hello! I'm Ibrahim Bidi, a passionate and experienced developer specializing in JavaScript. From Frontend to Backend, mobile to desktop, robotics to blockchain, JavaScript is my realm. I have been dedicated to this language for 22 years, watching it grow from humble beginnings on Earth üåç to its expansive presence in space üöÄ. JS is my heart and soul üß°
 Over the years, I've worked on numerous projects, contributed to the open-source community, and developed applications that have positively impacted many users. My journey began with creating the first Arabic keyboard for Windows 98 and has evolved into developing complex systems for various platforms.

events.text: Developed an Arabic keyboard for non-Arabic Windows 98 systems.
Created an Arabic programming framework based on JavaScript.
Developed Tifino, an application to support Tifinagh scripts in Windows, which received over 100,000 downloads.
Developed the Quran application AYAT 2 for King Saud University.
Created a system for managing and processing data via SMS or Whatsapp using Node.js and MongoDB.

items.name: Web Development
experienc: Worked with dozens of frontend and backend engineers and designers to develop project experience
Experience in accessible web design for government units (achieving National Communications Commission barrier-free web page 2.0 A-level certification)
SEO search engine optimization, Google keywords
Experience developing web pages using the Bootstrap4/UIkit framework
Experience designing RWD web pages using HTML5, SCSS, and jQuery
Led a team of designers/interns to build websites and provided teaching experience
BI Software Interface Beautification Experience (KNIME, MicroStrategy, Tableau, IBM Cognos)

items.name: Backend Development & Microservices
experience: Extensive experience with Node.js and Deno for building scalable server-side applications
Implemented microservices architecture for several projects, enhancing modularity and performance
Proficient in using Express.js for creating RESTful APIs
Experience with database design and management using MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and Redis
Developed and deployed serverless applications using AWS Lambda and Firebase Functions
Worked on real-time data processing applications using WebSockets and pushDB
Created secure and efficient authentication systems using JWT and OAuth
